text: aur (vah vakt yaad karo) jab hamane banee eesarail se (jo tumhaare burjug the) ahad va paimaan liya tha ki khuda ke siva kisee kee ibaadat na karana aur maan baap aur qaraabatadaaron aur yateemon aur mohataajon ke saath achchhe sulook karana aur logon ke saath achchhee tarah (naramee) se baaten karana aur baraabar namaaz padhana aur zakaat dena phir tumamen se thode aadimiyon ke siva (sab ke sab) phir gae aur tum log ho hee iqaraar se munh pherane vaale
